# `sleep`

### Parameters

Name | Type | Default | Description
---- | ---- | ------- | -----------
`seconds` | number |  |Duration of delay


### Description

Delay execution for a specified time interval (in seconds). In Javascript this function is implemented in blocking, CPU-hogging way.
